tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: One Direction "Live While We're Young" New Single!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: One Direction "Live While We're Young" New Single! Subscribe | bit.ly Send Chels a Tweet! | bit.ly Follow Hollywire! | bit.ly One Direction is releasing their new single "Live While We're Young" this October!! After teasing fans on twitter yesterday with a 'big announcement,' it has emerged that fine fellas will release their brand spankin' new single in two months! 1D worked on this single with the same team responsible for their smash hits 'What Makes You Beautiful' along with 'One Thing' -- and word has it this single is: "an immediate, energy-packed song mixing rock undertones with smooth harmonies, about living for the moment." -- rock on! We're also excited for the boys' performance at the upcoming VMA's. So much 1D!!!!

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: OMG,﻿ Please﻿﻿ ﻿﻿ support Nialls Irish Cousin "Sarah Toner"﻿ Awesome﻿﻿ singer , Amazing﻿ cover,Sensational comments, only 14. Take time﻿﻿ to﻿﻿ listen you will﻿﻿ be very﻿ pleased, This is﻿ one talented family﻿ (1D 4﻿﻿ Ever)﻿ PLEASE PLEASE Support Sarah.The very best way to help﻿ Sarah is﻿ to Tell﻿ all your friends & comment about her talent on Youtube, Facebook, Twitter & any social network.
why﻿ they always touching each other lol
She said Live While YOUR Young...get your﻿ facts right!!!
OMG HOW IS IT POSSIBLE THAT EVERY TIME I SEE﻿ THEM THEY GET HOTTER!!!! HOW IS IT POSSIBLE!!!??????
ok wait that promo﻿ was hilarious
I'm more excited﻿ about the VMA performance!!!!
Niall's biceps -3﻿ he's lookin good in that tank top lmao ;)
VMA performance. I﻿ just love seeing them live and with so much energy! ;D
